title: I would be remiss
author: VD
content_html:
If I failed to note that we just ripped past 100k visitors in a month for the first time. So, thanks for coming by and feel free to hang around as long as you like. As long as you don’t piss off the blonde, bring up Round One or inadvertantly summon the Bane, you should be fine.

And I’d also like to compliment Brent for his fine, fine work in adeptly distracting nearly the entire Ilk with a single deft mention of things that go bang. Holy cats, does he have your number! I’ve never seen so many people fail a saving throw against “Look, Gun!” Y’all should probably check your pockets to make sure you still have your wallets.
content_text:
If I failed to note that we just ripped past 100k visitors in a month for the first time.  So, thanks for coming by and feel free to hang around as long as you like.  As long as you don’t piss off the blonde, bring up Round One or inadvertantly summon the Bane, you should be fine.
And I’d also like to compliment Brent for his fine, fine work in adeptly distracting nearly the entire Ilk with a single deft mention of things that go bang.  Holy cats, does he have your number!  I’ve never seen so many people fail a saving throw against “Look, Gun!”  Y’all should probably check your pockets to make sure you still have your wallets.
